General.Name: Uxin Ltd
General.Description: Uxin Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the retail sale of vehicles in China. The company operates an e-commerce platform for buying and selling used cars. It also provides used-car acquisition, inspection, reconditioning, warehousing, pre-sales and after-sales, and various car-related value-added products and services, as well as warranty and repair, delivery, and title transfers and vehicle registration services. In addition, the company offers its vehicles through live streaming. Uxin Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 16 Guangshun South Avenue, Beijing, China, 100102

10.name: Vermillion & White Wealth Management Group LLC
